alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:22PM EDT until August 28 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Eastern Troup County in west central Georgia... South central Coweta County in west central Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Odessadale, or near Greenville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Hogansville, Grantville, Luthersville, Moreland, Lone Oak, Rocky Mount, Saint Marks, Mountville, Odessadale, Stovall, Big Springs, Durand, Harris City, and Wooster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
